spec_data.Name: bind-chroot
spec_data.Description:
This package contains a tree of files which can be used as a
chroot(2) jail for the named(8) program from the BIND package.
Based on the code from Jan "Yenya" Kasprzak <kas@fi.muni.cz>
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 15 Sep 2017 09:21:38 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A chroot runtime environment for the ISC BIND DNS server, named(8)
